name: Bigmart Elements
author: wpcirqle

sections.description: Bigmart Elements is a companion plugin for Bigmart theme. The plugin contains the basic elementor elements.
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have installed and activated the \’Elementor\’ plugin before installing the plugin then,
  2. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to Pages > Add New
  5. Press the \’Edit with Elementor\’ button.
  6. Now you can drag and drop widgets under Bigmart Elements from the left panel onto the content area, as well as add new sections and columns that make up the page structure.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Initial Release

1.0.2

  • Added Padding and alignment options for Product Category Tab widget.
  • Modified author icon in blog grid widgets

1.0.3

  • Added Padding and alignment options for Product Tab widget.

short_description: A companion plugin for Bigmart WordPress Theme.
